duties_responsibilities.duty: Improve EH&S performance by promoting an incident-free workplace, identifying and mitigating safety risks, and implementing safety programs.
Lead safety incident investigations, develop root cause analysis, and identify corrective actions.
Conduct risk assessments, audits, and guide teams in implementing corrective actions to ensure compliance.
Project management and coordination of continuous improvement actions.
Create Toolbox Talks and presentations, deliver them to operational teams.
Program Management and training for Powered Industrial Trucks, Shipping of Dangerous Goods, and DOT/FMCSA Driver Qualification Program.
Perform GEMBA walks (behavioral safety observations) in partnership with operational teams, influence overall safety culture.
Data collection and analysis, routine internal reporting.
Conduct business with the highest ethical standards and ensure the safety of all persons associated with ASML operations.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Environmental/Occupational Health & Safety or related field of study (Master’s degree is a plus).
